product_name: WEMEET 24oz Water Bottle with Removable Straw and Chug Lid, Two Ways to Drink, 18/10 Stainless Steel Double Walled Water Bottle, for Sports, Work, Travel, School(BLUE BLUE)
description: üåªTwo Ways to Drink: The 18/10 Stainless Steel Water Bottle comes with a removable straw and chug Lid, the sloping spout is ergonomically designed that make drinking water more convenient and smooth. This straw can perfectly match the spout, with no trouble with lid switching. Closes with a secure latch and won't leak when inverted.  üå∑Top Level Material: The Metal Bottle Body is built with the best 18/10 stainless steel material, which is fully resistant to oxidation and corrosion; The Chug Lid is made from durable Tritan material which will not deform and no harmful substances under high temperature, all the materials are best and 100% BPA free, Enjoy cold drinks and rest assured hot drinksÔºÅ üå≥Keep Drinks Cold & Hot: The metal water bottle features a double wall stainless steel design, which can keep your beverages cold and hot with a fresh taste. The double-wall vacuum-insulated water bottle helps the liquids icy or piping hot  üåºPortable & Easy to Clean: Comes with a removable strap, which is durable and makes the bottle easy to go anywhere. The lid and the bottle are dishwasher safe. Of course,they will extend their lifetime with hand washing. the removable straw is very easy to assemble, you can thoroughly clean the entire bottle of all accessories.  üåµCustomer Service: Quality is Life, We've tested it countless times to provide excellent bottles for all customers, any questions are welcome, and thankful to help us to perfect every detail, we will respond within 24 hours.

latest_reviews.review_title: great design feature, convient to carry and reasonable price
latest_reviews.review_text: I have been loving this drinking bottle very much since I bought it. First, it gives me a great drinking experience because it comes with a removable straw and chug Lid, and also, ergonomically designed sloping spout adds a lot of convenience to drink whenever I want. Second, this bottle is easy to carry on the side pocket of my backpack and it keeps the water temp pretty good. Third, I feel the price is reasonable and a little bit cheaper comparing with other similar bottles I bought in my past. Overall, I feel happy about it and would like to recommend to people who want to experience it.

latest_reviews.review_title: The best water bottle I've owned

latest_reviews.review_text: Wish I had read reviews on leaking.  Love the bottle and design. But it leaked nside my bag and damaged my laptop. Unfortuanetly I don't recommend.
